SELECT DISTINCT(d.device_id), d.precinct_id, d.device_id, d.device_name, d.device_kind FROM t_scim_facetask f JOIN t_cfg_device d ON f.camera_id = d.device_id or d.device_kind = 10 JOIN t_cfg_precinct p ON f.precinct_id = p.precinct_id WHERE d.device_kind = 4 or d.device_kind = 10 ORDER BY f.create_time ASC;

select a.camera_id as cameraId,c.device_name as cameraName,a.latitude,a.longitude from t_sps_camera_ex a left join t_cfg_device c on c.device_id=a.camera_id where c.device_kind=4 or c.device_kind = 10

select a.camera_id as cameraId,c.device_name as cameraName,a.latitude,a.longitude from t_sps_camera_ex a left join t_fss_usergroup_device b on a.camera_id=b.device_id left join t_cfg_device c on c.device_id=a.camera_id where c.device_kind=4 or c.device_kind=10 and b.user_group_id=#{UserGroupID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
